mapper.insert: INSERT INTO player(playerName, teamId, position, createDate) VALUES(#{playerName}, #{teamId}, #{position}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.teamName "teamName", p.playerName "playerName", p.createDate , ( SELECT COUNT(*) + 1 FROM player WHERE playerName < p.playerName ) AS no FROM player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id order by no
SELECT * FROM player ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT p.id, p.playerName "playerName", p.position, t.teamName "teamName", p.createDate FROM player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.teamId = t.id
